name: ABAP Learning Practice
description: A comprehensive learning repository covering ABAP programming fundamentals to advanced topics, featuring clean code practices, extensive examples, interview preparation materials, and real-world coding patterns. Built as a structured educational resource for SAP ABAP developers.

responsibilities: Developed comprehensive ABAP syntax examples from basic to advanced levels
Implemented clean ABAP coding practices and best practices documentation
Created structured learning modules covering 19+ ABAP topics
Built interview preparation materials for major consulting companies
Documented advanced topics including OOP, SQL, and modern ABAP features

features: Comprehensive ABAP syntax coverage from Hello World to advanced OOP concepts
Clean ABAP best practices implementation following SAP style guidelines
Structured learning path with 19 basic syntax modules and 24 advanced topics
Interview preparation materials for top consulting companies
Real-world code examples with Vietnamese explanations and English code

metrics: Covers 43+ ABAP programming topics with practical examples
Includes interview materials for 10+ major consulting companies
Contains 100+ ABAP code examples and demonstrations
Implements SOLID principles and GRASP design patterns in ABAP context
highlights: Built comprehensive ABAP learning repository with structured progression
Implemented clean code practices following SAP official style guidelines
Created bilingual documentation approach (Vietnamese explanations, English code)
Developed extensive reference materials including system tables and transaction codes
